_id.description: objectId - The Unique identifier for this recipe.
_id.title: Recipe ID.

name.description: string - The name/title of this recipe.
name.title: Recipe name.

recipeDescription.description: string - A brief description of this recipe.
recipeDescription.title: Recipe description.

cookTime.description: int - The approximate time for this recipe in 5 minute intervals.
cookTime.title: Recipe cook time.

ingredients.description: [objectId] - An array of ID's listing all ingredients in this recipe.
ingredients.title: Ingredient map for this recipe.

instructions.description: string - The cooking instructions for this recipe.
instructions.title: Recipe instructions.

measurements.description: [string] - An array of measurements where each item corresponds to an ingredient.
measurements.title: Ingredient measurements.

category.description: string - The category of this recipe (i.e. American, Thai, French, etc).
category.title: Recipe category.
